item.title: Vengeance
item.dc:creator: @Elux Elux
item.description:
@Elux wrote:

I need help with my vengeance.
When its casted it only casts and the skull shows to the south
I want it so that when u cast it, it will show whatever way your facing

Here is the veng code

 public void CastVengeance() {
    if ((playerHasItemAmount(563, 2) == true)
            && (playerHasItemAmount(555, 8) == true)) {
        if (playerLevel[6] >= 96 && CanVen == true) {
            if (Vengeance == true) {
                sendMessage("You already have Vengeance casted!");
            }
            if (VenTimer > 0) {
                sendMessage("You have to wait to cast another!");
            } else if (Vengeance != true) {
	    stillgfxz(342, absY, absX, 90, 0);
                Vengeance = true;
                startAnimation(1914);
                VengeanceTimer = 360;
                VenTimer = 70;
                deleteItem(555, getItemSlot(555), 8); 
                deleteItem(563, getItemSlot(563), 2);
            } else if (playerLevel[6] < 96) {
                sendMessage(
                        "You need a magic level of 96 to cast Vengeance!");
            }
        }

What do i need to do ?

Read full topic
